description.@en: They can never truly trap you if they cannot discover the truth. An intricate web of lies protects me and mine from those who would destroy us. Yet the survival habit has become the norm and speaking earnestly often escapes me.

effect.@en: You may flip the results to succeed at Bargain and Guile Tests. However, you cannot succeed at Charm or Leadership Tests unless confessing a painful truth you previously lied about.
